title: Citi's Nathan Sheets discusses the European Central Bank's long-term refinancing operation
summary: Nathan Sheets, Citi Global Head of International Economics, visited Bloomberg TV's Inside Track to discuss the second installment of the ECB's long-term refinancing operation. Sheets also commented on the potential for a third round of quantitative easing by the Federal Reserve.
tag-1: Citi's Nathan Sheets discusses the European Central Bank's long-term refinancing operation
